name: Packin' Plax
summary: The goal is to group the plax together based on their colors. Once you get three or more similar plax grouped together they will be packaged up and ready to ship. The groups can be formed either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally - and you will receive more or less points depending on the size and style of package. Be careful though, because if you miss catching five plax or fill up the table without any packages then the game will end.
